questions.question: Why do birds, squirrels, and others gather?
options: Curiosity draws them to see the race
They need to cross the path
They want to stop the race

questions.question: What expectation do most animals carry?
options: That the Hare will win easily
That the race will never start
That the Fox will run instead

questions.question: Why do they still want to watch?
options: They want to witness the story unfold
They hope the race is canceled
They need to count the steps
